title: Reflective Instructional Design Workshop for Optimizing Engineering Education Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic engineering education concepts and secondary education experience
context.additional_context: Short intensive course for current professionals to enhance optimized engineering education capabilities in social fields. Conducted via project-based learning in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the three core domains of the OLEET model (student composition, engineering topics, instructor skills) and apply them to their educational context
Through reflective practice, learners can diagnose conflicts with existing teaching methods and develop improvement strategies
In PBL environments, learners can develop learner-tailored support strategies when designing engineering projects that address social issues
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
